context: Doing good. What kind of movies do you like?
I really like movies like Ferris Bueller's Day Off (1986) I've seen it like ten times!

resp: No, License to Drive (1988) is totally different. Haha! The kid is older. It's one of the Coreys, I think Cory Haim.
